originalText.text: Alex was a great tutor. He not only had tremendous mastery of the material but he also really connected with my child. The combination of these two things created an extremely collaborative environment that allowed my daughter to bring up her SAT score by a lot! She will be attending an Ivy League school in the fall. I don’t believe this would have been possible without Alex.

originalText.text: Our son worked with two tutors from Inspirica and had a positive experience both times. Both Yuliya (SAT) and Cristina (SSAT) used their sessions to the fullest and had our son engaged throughout. They gave him relevant homework to practice outside of their sessions that helped him make progress and determine his specific needs. As a parent I found Inspirica to be professional and reliable and we were pleased with our son's increased scores.

originalText.text: Eric Kolb was an ideal tutor for my son. He was clear and direct, plus relatable for a high school junior. My son got exactly what he needed from his sessions with Eric and wound up doing very well on the test (and getting into his first-choice school early).

text.text: Eric Kolb was an ideal tutor for my son. He was clear and direct, plus relatable for a high school junior. My son got exactly what he needed from his sessions with Eric and wound up doing very well on the test (and getting into his first-choice school early).

originalText.text: The tutor they assigned to my daughter was perfect for her.  She was able to relate to her and motivate her to do the work.  It definitely helped her final SAT scores!

text.text: The tutor they assigned to my daughter was perfect for her.  She was able to relate to her and motivate her to do the work.  It definitely helped her final SAT scores!

originalText.text: As  a mom of two college-bound kids two years apart, I needed all the support I could get. After interviewing a few tutoring companies, we were excited and comforted to find Inspirica Pros. From the first interaction, the process was completely professional and instilled great confidence, above and beyond any of the other companies. The two different tutors were hand-selected for each of my kids according to their learning style and personalities. Both soared in their scores on the ACT and SAT and as a result got into their first choice of colleges. Thank you Inspirica and Lisa J for the life-long impact you’ve made on our family! I highly recommend Inspirica to any serious student who wants to excel.
